meanings.definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the addition of a carboxyl group to a substrate.
meanings.sent1: Carboxylases help in adding a carboxyl group to substances.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study carboxylases to understand how they work in cells.
meanings.sent3: The carboxylases at work in the lab seemed to be having a party with the molecules.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in the kitchen was like that of carboxylases adding the final touch to a recipe.
meanings.sent5: The carboxylases acted like tiny painters, carefully decorating the molecules with carboxyl groups.
